divs: Sighting DetailsI was at marching band practice with everyone else.We turned around on the fieldfrom marching.I saw a big disc silver shape in the sky it made no nose it waspretty low and big.It just stayed there.I couldnt watch it for like two or threeminutes because my director called sett you have to stand absoutly still,noteven moving your eyes.Got my water and looked back at the same place where I sawit and it was gone.My boyfriend found it weird but believed me.That wasbasically it.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around July 31st 2002
